title: a cool remix i did
body: can you please tell me your thoughts of it and please tell me if you liked/ disliked it. subscribe to m channel if you want more. the remix is of ed shearan bloodstream

replies.body: It's not exactly League related though, so I'm not sure if it does belong on player creations, or the boards at all.

Sorry OP that I can't give you feedback, I just really don't know anything about music, and hence don't like to have opinions on it.
